author: chaggo21

text:
I really thought I was the only one who enjoyed Opoona's soundtrack until I started following this channel!

I know this is an old series, but I think you would really like the first 3 Spyro the Dragon games for Psx (If you haven't already). They have an amazing soundtrack which usually goes unnoticed despite how great of games they are. They can also be beat in about 4-5 hours but are incredibly fun games. Anyways thanks uploading all of these great tracks! Keep up the awesome work!

author: Sephiko

text:
And now for a much more popular game: Opoona.

I've been playing this game and it's better than I thought it would be. A friend of mine told me it was underrated and I have to agree. The battle system could be more balanced, the story is mostly forgettable, but the world itself and the characters are really well done. Very unique game, one I'll definitely remember. That and the music is simply amazing. Too bad it went by completely unnoticed.
author: SupraDarky
